row.Name: Action
row.Description: Generic catch-all category

row.Name: Login
row.Description: User logs in with openid

row.Name: Logout
row.Description: User logs out

row.Name: Add OpenId
row.Description: User adds new openid

row.Name: Edit DisplayName
row.Description: User edits her/his DisplayName

row.Name: Edit Email
row.Description: User edits her/his Email

row.Name: Migrated
row.Description: User copied account from one site to another

row.Name: Daily Site Access
row.Description: Each day a user accesses the site, the user will get one of these!

row.Name: User Emailed
row.Description: An email is sent

row.Name: Annotation
row.Description: A moderator has given feedback on this user

row.Name: Suspend
row.Description: A moderator has suspended this user for a given time period

row.Name: Unsuspend
row.Description: A moderator has unsuspended this user for good behavior (or bribe)

row.Name: OptInEmailToggle
row.Description: A user has turned on or off their preference for receiving emails from the site

row.Name: AssociateAccount
row.Description: A user has associated one account with another from a different site

row.Name: CopyProfile
row.Description: A user has copied her/his profile from another site to this one

row.Name: DisassociateAccount
row.Description: A user has removed an association to another site

row.Name: Moderator Deletes User
row.Description: Site mod soft-deletes a user account

row.Name: Moderator Merge Users
row.Description: Site mod merges two user accounts

row.Name: Moderator Merge Questions
row.Description: Site mod merges two questions

row.Name: Moderator Recalc Rep
row.Description: Site mod recalcs rep for a single user

row.Name: Moderator Recalc All Rep
row.Description: Site mod recalcs rep for all users

row.Name: Moderator Destroyed User
row.Description: Site mod hard-deletes (destroys) a user and all posts

row.Name: Moderator Edits User
row.Description: Site mod edits a user profile

row.Name: Moderator Deletes Flag Votes
row.Description: Mod soft-deletes Spam and Offensive votes from a post

row.Name: Moderator Arbitrary Rep Change
row.Description: Site mod adds or subtracts reputation for a user

row.Name: Moderator Merge Tags
row.Description: Site mod merged two tags together

row.Name: Moderator Removes Bounty
row.Description: Mod removes an open bounty from a question

row.Name: User Recovers Account
row.Description: User logged in using the token sent in an account recovery email

row.Name: Sent Account Recovery Email
row.Description: User requests an account recovery email be sent
